description: Takes some time to work out how it works but once you get the hang of it, a good dos emulation system plays all my old dos gsmes
The arrow keys actually work with this as opposed to the original, which is super important for DOOM.
summary: Better than original DOSBox in every way

description: Simple and easy. And a simple method to have DOS system in any Linux distros.
I have tried many others. This is the best, it just works. thanks.

Me parece bastante inteligente y elimina muchas limitaciones que tiene el DOSbox original, antes tuve problema con las rutas pero aqui podia montar unidades desde cualquier parte de mi sistema. Me gusto mucho...
